title: Serif font
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016122649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Zweikommasieben_Motto_2-682x961_3566.jpg)
author: Emma-L

comments.content:
I could not find a match.  
As for Esta this would seem to fit if it was compressed and a sloped Regular or Bold was used instead of the Italic. Note that Esta Italic has a one story a while the image has a two story a. Similar comment for g.  
Don
